```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggformula)
library(png)
library(ggpubr)
library(grid)
```

## R Markdown

```{r}
img <- png::readPNG("soccerfield.png")
```


```{r Long Ball}
longBallClean %>% gf_jitter(longbally ~ longballx, color =~ LongBallSuccess, width = 1, height = 1) + scale_fill_continuous(guide = FALSE) + annotation_custom(rasterGrob(img, width = unit(0.82, "npc"),height = unit(1.1,"npc")),-Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf) + lims(x=c(-0.6,4.6), y = c(0,5))
```

```{r Long Ball Success Rates}
longBallClean %>%  group_by(LongBallSuccess) %>% 
  count() %>% spread(LongBallSuccess, n)
```


```{r Long Ball Successs Rate by Player}
longBallClean %>%  group_by(LongBall, LongBallSuccess) %>% 
  count() %>% spread(LongBallSuccess, n) %>% 
  mutate( `1` = replace_na(`1`,0),
          `2` = replace_na(`2`,0)) %>%
  mutate(Tries = `1`+`2`,
    SuccessRate = `1`/Tries ) %>%
  rename(JerseyNumber = LongBall,
         Successes = `1`,
         Fails = `2`) %>%
  arrange(desc(SuccessRate))  
```
